summary:
These crabs are special, so why should they look like each and every mudcrab around?
This mod makes them look as special as they are!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#d5a6bd]Original Mod:
***************[/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42438/?]Dragonborn Mudcrabs[/url] [color=#b4a7d6]by[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/583426/?]noxiousq12


[/url][b][color=#f9cb9c]Changes:
**********
[/color][/b][color=#ffe599]- Added optional texture as requested, that makes Sparky yellow instead of purple. Overwrite main or optional file with it. ;)
[/color]

[b][color=#a4c2f4]Description:
**************[/color][/b]
[color=#d5a6bd]This mod makes the standard looking mudcrab followers from Dragonborn Mudcrabs look as special as they are! Not only do they have the proper color according to the element of the spells they use, they did receive different meshes as well! So each of them does have an individual look, that will NOT affect any other mudcrab in your game.
[/color]
[color=#b4a7d6]There are two versions available, the standard version, that doesn't change anything additional to the textures and meshes, but their names, because I just felt like it - and an optional version that gives them double the speed, so they keep up with you a lot better. Choose which one you want.[/color]
[color=#a4c2f4]Tested and found to work alongside AFT and with My Home Is Your Home.
[/color]

[b][color=#d5a6bd]Where to find the little crabbies?
*************************************[/color][/b]
[color=#b4a7d6]Just like in the original mod, here are the places to find them:
- Sparky: Riverwood, near the bridge
- Snowflake: Falkreath, near the watermill
- Little Flame: Ivarstead near the bridge that leads over the river[/color]


[color=#a4c2f4][b]Additional information:
**************************[/b][/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]These little crabs are VERY powerful. I mean it! If you're playing on low difficulty, you won't have much fun with them, unless you want them to do your work and just watch - which is admittably amusing. They were made for master difficulty.
Each of them has its own aspect, fire, lightning and ice.

Taken from the original description:[/color]

[color=#b4a7d6][b]Sparky's special attacks: ///LIGHTNING///
-Whirlwind strike
-Ebonyflesh
-Lightning cloak
-Mass paralysis
-Summon mudcrab spirit
-Close Wounds
[/b][/color]
[b][color=#a4c2f4]Snowflake's special attacks: ///ICE///
-Frost breath
-Ice form
-Ebonyflesh
-Frost cloak
-Mass paralysis
-Summon mudcrab spirit
-Close Wounds[/color][/b]

[color=#d5a6bd][b]Little Flame's special attacks: ///FIRE///
-Fire breath
-Unrelenting force
-Ebonyflesh
-Flame cloak
-Mass paralysis
-Summon mudcrab spirit
-Close Wounds
[/b][/color][color=#b4a7d6]
There is also a substantial boost to their health and stamina as well as static damage resist ability. Dragonborn mudcrabs are essential and won't die, so you don't have to worry about that. They have no effect on your stealth meter, and unagressive and won't attack recklessly or engage into combat on sight, I tried to make them fit stealthy profiles too. Carrying capacity have also been increased in case you are over encumbered. I gave them a speed boost so that they can actually keep up with the player. [/color]

[color=#a4c2f4]The companions were made and tested on master difficulty, playing on lower difficulties may change the experience and make them look overpowered compared to other NPC's. Consider that they are mostly for high level characters, though they scale with you starting from level 10. Difficulty enhancing mods are very welcome.
[/color]

[b][color=#d5a6bd]How to install:
****************[/color][/b]
[color=#b4a7d6]Extract the archive to your Skyrim directory, or use the modmanager of your choice to install.
[/color]

[color=#a4c2f4][b]How to uninstall:
*******************[/b][/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]Either use the modmanager of your choice, or delete the following files from your Skyrim directory:
Data/Dragonborn Mudcrabs.esp
Data/Dragonborn Mudcrabs.bsl
Data/Dragonborn Mudcrabs.bsa
Data/meshes/actors/mudcrab/character assets/little_flame.nif
Data/meshes/actors/mudcrab/character assets/snowflake.nif
Data/meshes/actors/mudcrab/character assets/sparky.nif
Data/textures/mudcrab/little_flame.dds
Data/textures/mudcrab/snowflake.dds
Data/textures/mudcrab/sparky.dds
[/color]

[color=#b4a7d6][b]Credits:
*********[/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/583426/?]noxiousq12 [/url][color=#a4c2f4]- Original mod and scripts
(So be sure to leave him some kudos!)[/color][/center]
author: Kuschel-Drow
